1,en,en_f_voice,"Great practice! Now, let's learn how to respond to these questions.",0,1
2,en,en_f_voice,"When someone asks where you're from, you can say 'I come from New Zealand' like this:",0,1
3,da,da_f_voice,"Jeg kommer fra New Zealand",2000,3
4,en,en_f_voice,"Now, you might hear someone ask 'Are you new here?'",0,1
5,da,da_m_voice,"Er du ny her?",2000,3
6,en,en_f_voice,"And you can respond with 'Yes, I am'",0,1
7,da,da_f_voice,"Ja, det er jeg",2000,3
8,en,en_f_voice,"Now let's practice a conversation. Listen carefully:",0,1
9,da,da_m_voice,"Hej, jeg hedder Tom",3000,2
10,da,da_m_voice,"Hvad hedder du?",3000,2
11,da,da_f_voice,"Jeg hedder Maria",3000,2

13,da,da_f_voice,"Ja, det er jeg",3000,2
14,da,da_m_voice,"Hvor kommer du fra?",3000,2

16,en,en_f_voice,"Great! Let's practice those phrases one more time:",0,1
